name: Pocketspace
description:
In a world...

of space travel, relax and simply enjoy the calming scenery.

Fly along a preset path through space and observe strange alien planets.

This "game" was made for University with the task to use Unity Packages.

Music: HummingNature Space Ambient - No Copyright [FREE]

Fonts: Iconian Fonts. Raider Crusader. 1001 Free Fonts.
